Restart.title: Force Restart
Restart.description: This setting controls whether Baseline forces a restart after completion. Default is true.

ProgressBar.description: This setting controls whether Baseline displays a progress bar. Default is false.

ProgressBarDisplayNames.description: This setting controls whether Baseline displays the current item being processed under the progress bar. Default is false.

CleanupAfterUse.title: Cleanup After Use
CleanupAfterUse.description: This setting controls whether Baseline deletes it's install directory after use: /usr/local/Baseline.

ExitCondition.title: Exit Condition
ExitCondition.description: Define a file or folder path. If this file or folder exists, Baseline will exit quietly without processing any items.
